name: Profigure Loot Box
description:
Game a week #7

This game is an item collection game. The player can earn coins from the roulette wheel game or pay coins to draw the Profigure from the Gacha machines. 

#Profigure is a simple figure created by Probuilder.

The concept of this game is a crypto mobile game. The player can earn crypto from the game and pay crypto to draw the NFT art from the loot box.
